domains.name: cloudflare
domains.description: Cloudflare Pages deployment and configuration schema.

tools.name: deploy_pages
tools.description: Deploy a local build directory to a Cloudflare Pages project via Wrangler CLI.

tools.name: deploy_te_ao
tools.description: Run npm build for Te Ao and deploy the dist folder to Cloudflare Pages.
tools.path: wrangler pages deploy + npm run build

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create a new Cloudflare Pages project via the Pages API.

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List Cloudflare Pages projects for the configured account.

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Return metadata for a specific Pages project.

tools.name: set_env_vars
tools.description: Set environment variables for a Pages project (production and preview).

tools.name: list_deployments
tools.description: List deployments for a Pages project.

tools.name: add_custom_domain
tools.description: Bind a custom domain to a Pages project.

tools.name: purge_cache
tools.description: Purge the cache for a Cloudflare zone.

tools.name: git_repo_info
tools.description: Get repository information including stars, forks, description, and URL.

tools.name: git_list_branches
tools.description: List all branches in a repository with their latest commit SHA.

tools.name: git_create_branch
tools.description: Create a new branch from a specified base branch or commit.

tools.name: git_list_commits
tools.description: List commits for a branch with author, message, and SHA.

tools.name: git_get_file
tools.description: Get file contents from a repository.

tools.name: git_create_file
tools.description: Create a new file in a repository.

tools.name: git_update_file
tools.description: Update an existing file in a repository.

tools.name: git_delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file from a repository.

tools.name: git_list_pull_requests
tools.description: List pull requests with status, author, and branch info.

tools.name: git_get_pull_request
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific pull request.

tools.name: git_create_pull_request
tools.description: Create a new pull request from one branch to another.

tools.name: git_list_issues
tools.description: List issues in a repository.

tools.name: git_create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a repository.

tools.name: git_list_releases
tools.description: List releases for a repository.

tools.name: git_create_release
tools.description: Create a new release with tag and notes.

tools.name: git_get_user
tools.description: Get GitHub user profile information.

tools.name: git_list_workflows
tools.description: List GitHub Actions workflows in a repository.

tools.name: responses_generate
tools.description: Generate a response via the OpenAI Responses API.

tools.name: responses_get
tools.description: Retrieve a previously generated response by ID.

tools.name: render_list_services
tools.description: List all Render services with status, created date, and URLs.

tools.name: render_get_service
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific service.

tools.name: render_deploy
tools.description: Trigger a deployment for a service.

tools.name: render_list_deploys
tools.description: List deployment history for a service.

tools.name: render_get_deploy
tools.description: Get status and details of a specific deployment.

tools.name: render_update_env
tools.description: Update environment variables for a service.

tools.name: render_list_events
tools.description: List service events and activity logs.

tools.name: render_scale_service
tools.description: Scale a service (update number of instances).

tools.name: supabase_select
tools.description: Query rows from a Supabase table with filters.

tools.name: supabase_insert
tools.description: Insert a new row into a table.

tools.name: supabase_update
tools.description: Update rows in a table matching filter conditions.

tools.name: supabase_delete
tools.description: Delete rows from a table.

tools.name: supabase_rpc
tools.description: Call a stored procedure/function in Supabase.

tools.name: supabase_upload_file
tools.description: Upload a file to Supabase storage bucket.

tools.name: supabase_list_buckets
tools.description: List all storage buckets.

tools.name: tepo_kitenga_whisper
tools.description: Free-form text chat with optional retrieval, pipeline, and vector persistence. Main Kitenga conversation endpoint.

tools.name: tepo_vector_search
tools.description: Semantic search across vector store. Find similar content by meaning.

tools.name: tepo_ocr_scan
tools.description: Extract text from images, PDFs, or documents using OCR.

tools.name: tepo_pipeline_run
tools.description: Execute a data processing pipeline. Pipelines: ocr, summarise, translate, embed, taonga.

tools.name: tepo_reo_translate
tools.description: Translate text to/from Māori. Uses context for accuracy.

tools.name: tepo_memory_store
tools.description: Store content in vector memory with embedding. Maintains persistent context.

tools.name: tepo_memory_query
tools.description: Semantic search in memory. Retrieve stored context.

tools.name: tepo_kaitiaki_register
tools.description: Register a new kaitiaki (guardian/agent) with role, system prompt, and tools.

tools.name: tepo_task_execute
tools.description: Execute a task via a specific kaitiaki. Routes to appropriate guardian.

tools.name: tepo_db_chat_history
tools.description: Retrieve chat history for a session.

tools.name: tepo_db_taonga_search
tools.description: Search for taonga (treasured content) in database.

tools.name: tepo_health_check
tools.description: Check Te Pō backend health and status.

tools.name: tepo_list_kaitiaki
tools.description: List all registered kaitiaki in the system.
